quotes.quote: Every major difficulty you face in life is a fork in the road. You choose which track you will head down, toward breakdown or breakthrough.
Disordered love always leads to misery and breakdown. The only way to 'reorder' our loves is to love God supremely.
Catastrophe is the essence of the spiritual path, a series of breakdowns allowing us to discover the threads that weave all of life into a whole cloth.
If you want to give the devil a nervous breakdown, just get up every day and see how much good you can do.
Your best is whatever you can do comfortably without having a breakdown.
Breakdowns are really just breakthroughs. It takes hitting the bottom to make it to the top.
When there is breakdown in a relationship, you must have the hard conversation. It may not be pretty and it may not feel good. But if you are willing to listen and tell the truth, it will open up.
You're heading for a breakdown. Why don't you pull yourself to pieces.
Nervous breakdowns can be highly underrated methods of spiritual transformation.

Whether we like it or not, a breakdown in home-life will eventually lead to a breakdown everywhere. This is, surely, the most menacing and dangerous aspect of the state of society at this present time. Once the family idea, the family unit, the family life is broken up â€“ once that goes, soon you will have no other allegiance.
Madness need not be all breakdown. It may also be break-through. It is potential liberation and renewal as well as enslavement and existential death.
To be ill adjusted to a deranged world is not a breakdown.
A small communication breakdown is enough for everyone to be working on slightly different things. And then you loose focus.
To transform breakdowns into breakthroughs is the whole function of a master.
One of the symptoms of an approaching nervous breakdown is the belief that one's work is terribly important.
It is so easy to break down and destroy. The heroes are those who make peace and build.
Sometimes a breakdown can be the beginning of a kind of breakthrough, a way of living in advance through a trauma that prepares you for a future of radical transformation.
Psychological breakdowns are actually breakthroughs to enlightenment.
The simplest type of breakdown exhibits itself as an oscillation in a goal-seeking process which appears only when that process is actively invoked.
And revolutions always mean the breakdown of old authority.
War is not the continuation of policy. It is the breakdown of policy.
There is no breakthrough without a breakdown.
A nervous breakdown waits around the corner for anyone who lets himself wallow in bitterness. Little by little, it takes over your whole being.
The Breakdown in all human relations is unstated expectations.
The financial costs of family breakdown are incredibly high.
Sometimes you just need to breakdown to have all the pieces you need to build yourself up again.
What appears to be a breakdown can often be a breakthrough, if you understand God's grace.
Instead of me having a breakdown, I'm focusing on me having a breakthrough.
